verses.name: Matthew 16:8
verses.text: Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?

verses.name: Matthew 16:9
verses.text: Do ye not yet understand, neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?

verses.name: Matthew 16:10
verses.text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?

verses.name: Matthew 16:11
verses.text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread, that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees?
